pages.text: Though there are lots of ways to calculate time, most seem relatively... rustic. They are no match for this new trick up your sleeve: the time-affinity of $(l:general/shards#amethyst)Amethyst Shards$(/l).

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: You can toggle the durations for both active time ($(k:use)) and inactive time ($(k:sneak) + $(k:use) with empty hand).
